title: Bedcover, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed and resist printed on plain weave
description: Quilted bedcover with a printed pattern on both sides. One side is block printed in blue with a design of an undulating stem with large leaves and flowers and a small bird. The other side is printed in brown with a design of a central rectangle filled with intersecting diagonal lines and clover shapes. A border of stylized flowers and leaves encloses the central rectangle. A garland of leaves, flowers and pineapples runs along the edges.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, 18th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed and resist printed on plain weave. 1923-4-2.
